p.s: In the property field on the left, select "official website".
Copy and paste the URL of the official website of the institution in the middle field.
As Wikidata is a multilingual platform used by people from all around the world, it is useful to specify the language of the website.
To do this, click on "add qualifier".
Add the language of the official website.
Then click on "publish". Now you are done!
